title: Stories page empty-state messaging when stories list is empty

requirements.summary: Show a clear English empty-state message on the Stories page when the stories query succeeds but returns an empty array.
acceptanceCriteria: When useGetStories() returns [] (no error), the Stories page displays an English empty-state message (e.g., "No stories are available right now.") within the page content area.
When useGetStories() returns a non-empty array, the Stories page renders the story card grid as before.
The empty-state message does not expose any admin-only upload controls.

file_operations.description: Add an explicit empty-state branch (when stories is defined and stories.length === 0) that renders a clear English message within the page content area, and only render the story card grid when the list is non-empty.
